result.execSummary:
The defendant Steven M Dougherty was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 3rd Degree Sexual Assault, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Consecutive to: any other previously imposed sentence.

superMiscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or will discharge with outstanding financial obligations due, a civil judgment shall be entered for the balance due.

Submit DNA sample.  Register as a sex offender for 15 years.  Attend sex offender treatment and successfully complete.

**AMENDED 9-21-15** Court order: Deductions of 25% to be taken from all money received for the benefit of the inmate, to be paid towards restitution.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

from DOC Cami Vande Berg re: restitution

Defendant Steven M Dougherty in court, in custody with attorney Mark D. Lawton.  Crystal N Long appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PSI has been completed.  Both parties have received copies.  Atty Lawton addressed concerns of juvenile records being expunged but referenced in PSI.  Court addressed concerns.  Matter will proceed forward today, as agreed by both parties.  Recommendations given by ADA Long.  Statement made by Atty Lawton.  Court sentenced defendant to serve 7 years in the WI prison system, consecutive to any other sentence.  2 years initial confinement, and 5 years extended supervision.  $518.00 costs.  $50.00 restitution to crime victim compensation.  Submit DNA sample.  Register as a sex offender for 15 years.  Attend sex offender treatment and successfully complete.  Defendant is currently in the prison system in Fox Lake on another sentence.  No credit due for presentence incarceration.
by Probation agent Leah Hartman
with Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus to Fox Lake Correctional for 4/7/15 at 11 a.m.
Restitution stipulation in the probation amount of $50.00 and total of $55.00
